content.raw:
Hi @{5e7b71f68f31f90c2f034357} , please post questions like that on https://answers.gazebosim.org . This issue tracker is for bug reports and feature requests. 

Looking at your video, it looks like contacts are steady, so I'd guess the problem is that not enough force is being applied. Since it doesn't look like this is a bug on Gazebo, I'm going to close this. See you at Gazebo Answers. When you post there, it would be helpful to have explicit instructions on how to reproduce the issue.

Hi @Wasadim , please post questions like that on https://answers.gazebosim.org . This issue tracker is for bug reports and feature requests.

Looking at your video, it looks like contacts are steady, so I'd guess the problem is that not enough force is being applied. Since it doesn't look like this is a bug on Gazebo, I'm going to close this. See you at Gazebo Answers. When you post there, it would be helpful to have explicit instructions on how to reproduce the issue.
